body.header: IELTS Writing Task 2You should spend about 40 minutes on this task. You should write at least 250 words.

section.p: Present a written argument or case to an educated reader with no specialist knowledge of the following topic.

p.b: People increasingly spend their leisure time using computers, for example, surfing the Internet or playing computer games. This has brought benefits but has also created new problems.
To what extent do you agree or disagree with this statement?

section.p: You should use your own ideas, knowledge and experience and support your arguments with examples and relevant evidence.
